image_widget.alt_text: Pressing Leaves and Flowers by Judy Ann Sadler. A picture of a flower.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. image_widget.alt_text: You will need: fresh leaves and flowers. An old phone book, or newspaper and a catalog (a type of book that a store makes to show what it sells.) scrap paper. heavy books.

text_widget.alt_text: 1. Pick or cut the flowers on a dry day so they are not damp. Pick only as many as you can press at one time so they don't wilt.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent?

text_widget.alt_text: 2. Open the phone book near the back. Place a few flowers and leaves as open and flat as possible face down on the page. Leave lots of space around each one.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent am?

image_widget.alt_text: Flowers laid on an open book.

text_widget.alt_text: 3. If you are using newspaper and a catalog instead of a phone book, place at least two layers of newspaper in the open catalog. Lay the plants on it and carefully place two layers of newspaper on top.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan?

image_widget.alt_text: Pages covering the flowers in a book.

text_widget.alt_text: 4. Use scraps of paper to mark where in the book you've pressed flowers.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent am?

image_widget.alt_text: A scrap of paper marking the page.

text_widget.alt_text: 5. Gently roll some of the phone book or catalog pages closed over the plants. Place more plants in the book for pressing, marking the pages as you go.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent am?

image_widget.alt_text: Gently putting pages over the flowers.

text_widget.alt_text: 6. Lay the book or catalog flat in a warm, dry place where it is not likely to be disturbed. Place a few heavy books on top.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent am?

image_widget.alt_text: Heavy books on top of the one with the flowers.

text_widget.alt_text: 7. Wait at least one week before you check the plants. If they are stuck to the paper or feel damp, they are not ready. Check them again in a week.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent am?

text_widget.alt_text: 8. Remove some plants to make crafts and press more. Keep adding to your collection. Pressed flowers can be stored in a book for months or years.

scrolling_text_panel.text_widget: . Irillam, coreet ad molorperci tat, vulluptatum dolestrud min exerit at. Loreet adiat vel eum eliquisi blaore vent prat ad tat lum num zzriure tat. Ut accumsandre dolore tie commy nullutat in velenis iduis nis acipis nummy nulputate tem qui essim ilisit vullan hent am?

image_widget.alt_text: An open book showing the pressed flowers.
More ideas. Since thick flowers, such as roses, do not press well, you can remove the petals and press them separately. Use them as you would use other pressed plants.
